ReturnOnCapital.returnOnAssetsTTM: Net income divided by total assets; measures how effectively a company uses its assets to generate profit.
ReturnOnCapital.operatingReturnOnAssetsTTM: Operating income divided by total assets; isolates operational profitability from total resources.
ReturnOnCapital.returnOnTangibleAssetsTTM: Net income divided by tangible assets; strips out intangibles for a conservative return measure.
ReturnOnCapital.returnOnEquityTTM: Net income divided by shareholder equity; reflects profitability to equity holders.
ReturnOnCapital.returnOnInvestedCapitalTTM: NOPAT divided by invested capital; measures return generated on all capital providers.
ReturnOnCapital.returnOnCapitalEmployedTTM: EBIT divided by capital employed; indicates how well capital is used in the core business.

CapexAndCostStructure.capexToOperatingCashFlowTTM: Capital expenditures divided by operating cash flow; assesses reinvestment capacity from internal funding.
CapexAndCostStructure.capexToDepreciationTTM: Capex divided by depreciation; distinguishes between maintenance and growth investment.
CapexAndCostStructure.capexToRevenueTTM: Capex divided by revenue; reflects capital intensity relative to scale.
CapexAndCostStructure.salesGeneralAndAdministrativeToRevenueTT: SG&A expenses divided by revenue; evaluates operational overhead burden.
CapexAndCostStructure.researchAndDevelopementToRevenueTTM: R&D expenses divided by revenue; shows innovation investment intensity.
CapexAndCostStructure.stockBasedCompensationToRevenueTTM: Stock-based compensation divided by revenue; assesses dilution and equity-based pay structure.

AssetAndCapitalQuality.intangiblesToTotalAssetsTTM: Intangible assets divided by total assets; assesses reliance on non-physical asset base.
AssetAndCapitalQuality.workingCapitalTTM: Current assets minus current liabilities; basic measure of short-term operational liquidity.
AssetAndCapitalQuality.investedCapitalTTM: Debt plus equity minus non-operating assets; total capital deployed in operations.
AssetAndCapitalQuality.netCurrentAssetValueTTM: Current assets minus total liabilities; a liquidation-style valuation approach.
AssetAndCapitalQuality.tangibleAssetValueTTM: Total assets minus intangible assets; reflects physical, conservatively valued asset base.

CashCycle.daysOfSalesOutstandingTTM: Average days it takes to collect revenue; gauges receivables efficiency.
CashCycle.daysOfPayablesOutstandingTTM: Average days to pay suppliers; higher values improve working capital.
CashCycle.daysOfInventoryOutstandingTTM: Average days inventory is held before sale; evaluates inventory management.
CashCycle.operatingCycleTTM: DSO + DIO; time it takes to convert inventory into cash via sales.
CashCycle.cashConversionCycleTTM: Operating cycle minus DPO; net duration cash is tied up in operations.

Profitability.grossProfitMarginTTM: Gross profit divided by revenue; measures pricing power and production efficiency.
Profitability.operatingProfitMarginTTM: Operating income divided by revenue; evaluates profitability from core operations.
Profitability.ebitMarginTTM: EBIT divided by revenue; broader view of operating profitability before interest and taxes.
Profitability.ebitdaMarginTTM: EBITDA divided by revenue; includes non-cash charges for a smoother profitability profile.
Profitability.pretaxProfitMarginTTM: Pretax income divided by revenue; shows earnings strength before tax effects.
Profitability.netProfitMarginTTM: Net income divided by revenue; comprehensive measure of profitability after all costs.
Profitability.bottomLineProfitMarginTTM: Equivalent to net profit margin; captures final earnings performance.
Profitability.continuousOperationsProfitMarginTTM: Profit from continuing operations divided by revenue; excludes one-time items.

CashFlowStrength.operatingCashFlowRatioTTM: Operating cash flow divided by current liabilities; assesses liquidity from operations.
CashFlowStrength.operatingCashFlowSalesRatioTTM: Operating cash flow divided by revenue; shows efficiency of cash generation from sales.
CashFlowStrength.freeCashFlowOperatingCashFlowRatioTTM: Free cash flow divided by operating cash flow; highlights discretionary cash.
CashFlowStrength.capitalExpenditureCoverageRatioTTM: Operating cash flow divided by capex; evaluates internal funding capacity for investment.
CashFlowStrength.dividendPaidAndCapexCoverageRatioTTM: Operating cash flow divided by dividends and capex; tests payout sustainability.
CashFlowStrength.operatingCashFlowCoverageRatioTTM: Operating cash flow divided by total obligations; broader liquidity measure.
CashFlowStrength.shortTermOperatingCashFlowCoverageRatioT: Operating cash flow divided by short-term liabilities; tests immediate cash coverage.

Efficiency.receivablesTurnoverTTM: Revenue divided by average receivables; measures collection efficiency.
Efficiency.payablesTurnoverTTM: COGS divided by payables; shows how fast suppliers are paid.
Efficiency.inventoryTurnoverTTM: COGS divided by inventory; evaluates inventory movement speed.
Efficiency.fixedAssetTurnoverTTM: Revenue divided by fixed assets; measures long-term asset utilization.
Efficiency.assetTurnoverTTM: Revenue divided by total assets; assesses how efficiently assets are used.
Efficiency.workingCapitalTurnoverRatioTTM: Revenue divided by working capital; evaluates short-term capital productivity.

Liquidity.currentRatioTTM: Current assets divided by current liabilities; basic liquidity test.
Liquidity.quickRatioTTM: Quick assets divided by current liabilities; excludes inventory for stricter liquidity.
Liquidity.cashRatioTTM: Cash divided by current liabilities; most conservative liquidity metric.

Solvency.debtToEquityRatioTTM: Total debt divided by shareholder equity; gauges financial leverage.
Solvency.debtToAssetsRatioTTM: Total debt divided by total assets; shows how much of the company is financed by debt.
Solvency.debtToCapitalRatioTTM: Debt divided by total capital; measures debt share in long-term funding.
Solvency.longTermDebtToCapitalRatioTTM: Long-term debt divided by total capital; isolates structural debt component.
Solvency.financialLeverageRatioTTM: Total assets divided by equity; reflects balance sheet leverage.
Solvency.solvencyRatioTTM: Net income plus depreciation divided by total liabilities; estimates long-term solvency.
Solvency.debtServiceCoverageRatioTTM: EBITDA divided by debt service obligations; measures debt repayment ability.
Solvency.interestCoverageRatioTTM: EBIT divided by interest expense; evaluates ability to cover interest obligations.

PerShareFundamentals.revenuePerShareTTM: Total revenue divided by average outstanding shares; normalizes sales across equity base.
PerShareFundamentals.netIncomePerShareTTM: Net income divided by shares; foundational EPS indicator.
PerShareFundamentals.cashPerShareTTM: Cash divided by shares; indicates liquidity on a per-share basis.
PerShareFundamentals.bookValuePerShareTTM: Equity divided by shares; represents accounting value of equity.
PerShareFundamentals.tangibleBookValuePerShareTTM: Tangible equity divided by shares; excludes intangibles for conservative view.
PerShareFundamentals.shareholdersEquityPerShareTTM: Total equity divided by shares; similar to book value per share.
PerShareFundamentals.operatingCashFlowPerShareTTM: Operating cash flow divided by shares; evaluates cash profitability per unit.
PerShareFundamentals.capexPerShareTTM: Capex divided by shares; investment intensity per share.
PerShareFundamentals.freeCashFlowPerShareTTM: Free cash flow divided by shares; indicates discretionary earnings.
PerShareFundamentals.interestDebtPerShareTTM: Interest-bearing debt divided by shares; shows per-share financial burden.

TaxAndEarningsStructure.effectiveTaxRateTTM: Tax expense divided by pretax income; reflects tax burden efficiency.
TaxAndEarningsStructure.netIncomePerEBTTTM: Net income divided by earnings before tax; shows tax and non-operating impact.
TaxAndEarningsStructure.ebtPerEbitTTM: EBT divided by EBIT; measures effect of interest on earnings.
